website_summaries.verdict: We would compare this rug pad material to non-slip kitchen shelving paper. Trims down to customized sizes easily but may also need to be trimmed straight out of the box. We like its affordable price point and eco-friendly design.
pros: uses only plant-based oils and polymers
Works well with smaller area rugs and mats
cons: Adhesive qualities tend to fade after a few weeks
Stated dimensions do not always match real world results
Does not provide much additional cushioning, just additional grip

customer_reviews.title: Works great for runner
customer_reviews.text: Did the job perfectly. Had to put down a runner on my wood floor so the dog would not slip. Then the rug was slipping when he ran across it. This rug pad keeps the rug in place perfectly. Was a little long but trimmed down to exact size easily.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Mccrory

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT! thank me later
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money bought it for my hall way rug since we have tile it hasent slipped or moved from position ever since worth the money and cheaper than others dont think about it twice!! JUST GET IT
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: All rug sizes are considered "approximate" and rug pads are the same; However you don't call a 2.5' x 4' rug or pad a 3' x 5' because its "close enough". I ordered this rug pad to go under a fine rug I recently purchased and as soon as I pulled this out of the package, I knew it was the wrong size. It measured 6" short on the width and 10" short on the length; hello, that's almost a foot! Yet it was packaged as a 3' x 5' anyway. That's deceiving. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: I tried these on ur area rugs and they didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on ur area rugs and they didn't stop them from moving on carpet or tile. They may work on other surfaces/
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap rug mat
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a fine cheap non-slip rug. I have a tiny apartment and needed some carpeting to cover the space between my bed and door. This mat is cut to fit a 3x5 rug on top, but not 3x5 itself. Instead it is slightly smaller than 3x5 so you don't have to worry about finding a perfect placement for a rug of the same size. So far my rug has not slipped. It is doing its job. It does not ad much padding, but my rug is heavy and thick so that is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold small rugs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this size in order to cut to fit two small rugs. It's a waste of money. It doesn't keep small rugs in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kicker

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: This carpet pad was the size that I ordered and was used for throw rugs in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Cautious Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to find thickness specification for all the available rug pads - even Vantage's own web site doesn't tell me the differences between the dozen or so pad types they sell. Fortunately this is a really thin pad, which is what I was looking for - it stops the rug from slipping but doesn't add any significant cushioning or height. Shipping was slower than many Amazon sellers, but still within the promised arrival date.
customer_reviews.author: T. Addison

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My rug now stays put when I play laser tag with my cat and she is in high gear on the area carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fairhurst

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: The extra padding is noticeable and this pad has kept my rug in place. I folded it under on one side (instead of cutting it) to fit to my rug, but the extra fold is not noticeable from above. I still sometimes catch the corner of the rug and it folds back, but I am generally pleased with this pad.
customer_reviews.author: kwallaby

customer_reviews.title: Failed the Non-Slip Test
customer_reviews.text: Installed under a hallway runner on a hardware floor. I like the material as it does not bulk up the runner but it does not stay put. The runner moves forward and backward, side to side - never in the same place, which means the runner is always getting adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: #18 Fan, M&M's 4-ever

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Not 3 X 5 at all. Measures 2.6 x 4.2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful nonslip rug pad. I use it under a throw rug at my front door which is on top of a polished wood floor. The purpose of the throw rug is to be the last line of defense against dirt and grit when someone comes in the door. This pad makes sure it stays exactly in place. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SJHS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work with hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Advertised to work on hardwood floors. Rugs sliding just as much as they were before I put it down. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen mcgowan-york

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want or need a thinner rug pad
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a product like this unless it's special in some good or bad way. It does what I wanted it to do. I wanted a thinner rug pad, and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyrobot

customer_reviews.title: Does not stop rug from sliding.
customer_reviews.text: This did not keep my rug from sliding at all.
customer_reviews.author: AshAOtt

customer_reviews.title: My new rugs were borderline dangerous without anything under them ...
customer_reviews.text: My new rugs were borderline dangerous without anything under them. This did the trick! They do slide if you put some force behind it but normal walking they don't slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Does not leave marks on my wood floors like some reviewers mentioned
customer_reviews.text: It is a rug mat, just works. Does not leave marks on my wood floors like some reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an environmentally friendly rug grip in a small size. It was a bit hard to find online in the size we were looking for, but then we found this one. It's perfect! Shipping took a little longer than we would have liked, but otherwise transaction was smooth and painless. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: vintagegirl

customer_reviews.title: It does a nice job holding the rug in place though
customer_reviews.text: This adds very little cushioning. It does a nice job holding the rug in place though. I was disappointed. I expected it to be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT The Correct Size!
customer_reviews.text: As noted by other posters, this is NOT, I repeat NOT for a 3' x 5' rug. It is much, much smaller than the stated size. Quality seems just fine for the money, but you will need to buy a bigger size. I should have listened :(
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: These 3 x 5 were more like 2 1/2 x 4 1/4, but they hold the carpets in place securely.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution for sliding rugs..
customer_reviews.text: Didnt quite need this size for a small rug but bought it anyway and cut it down to size easily. The rug now does not slide at all. A perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ben L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold the rug in place, which is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold the rug in place, which is the entire point of this item. It gets scrunched up under the rug and then everything slides around.
customer_reviews.author: A. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: cheap fix
customer_reviews.text: for such a cheap price you cant go wrong with this , and it doesnt have to be the exact size . does a great job holding it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Way too thin
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Way too thin. Does not provide any cushion. Poorly cut, is not 3x5 or even a true rectangle (lop sided).
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: Rug happy
customer_reviews.text: Thin no odor fits the rug well. Overall happy with the purchase. Would recommend to others for a cushy carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara peck-marris

customer_reviews.title: Non-slip rug underlays
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you have throw rugs on hard floors. I have used these for years with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Albee

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how eco it is but it makes me feel psychologically better..
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's meant too. I don't know how eco it is but it makes me feel psychologically better... :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: does all that it is supposed to. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These work much better than the ones I had purchaed at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: They work well and at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are what I needed to keep rugs from slipping. Do the job well. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: JoonMoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product with good sizing options. Has done good job keeping rug in place.
customer_reviews.author: John Hobbs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 4x6 works fine, 2x4 doesn't at all
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 pads for 4x6 rugs and this 2-4 pad. The larger 2 are great! This one doesn't do the trick as the rug still moves. I don't know why because they're the same brand pads.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! We have two big dogs who like to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! We have two big dogs who like to restore on the rug and it holds it in place very well! The price is great!
customer_reviews.author: kim Hugger

customer_reviews.title: Works very well! The carpet I've placed on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! The carpet I've placed on it never moves anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: for a basic rug pad to keep it in place, this is great. It does not provide additional cushioning though
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Sizing - will not cover entire rug surface
customer_reviews.text: Very deceptive sizing.... at only 30" x 50" it didn't even come close to fitting my 3' x 5' rug. If you're trying to prevent slips and tripping, aren't the edges the most important part of the rug to cover?
customer_reviews.author: rmrjr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as big as you would think, but it works
customer_reviews.author: Torchsingz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but it is not 3x5. Be sure and read the actual dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a little while but now my rug ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a little while but now my rug slides around as if there is no pad underneath it at all, not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Truck

customer_reviews.title: The quality is fine, but I ordered 3'x5' (and paid for 3x5) ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine, but I ordered 3'x5' (and paid for 3x5) and the package said 3x5 but the actual pad is 29"x49".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I was expecting it to be! : ) works well
customer_reviews.author: Christy L

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No as useful as I had hoped rug still slips a bit
customer_reviews.author: April Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's OK....
customer_reviews.text: I mean for the price, it does work. You simply can't beat the price. But, on hardwood floors its simply not the best. Carpet still slides a bit. (Always a bit of scare!) When it comes time to a buy a new one, I probably would take my chance on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alison O

customer_reviews.title: NOT 2' x 4'
customer_reviews.text: Size of the rug pad is NOT 2' x 4'. The actual pad size is 20" by 40". The packaging indicates it fits rugs up to 2' x 4'. I purchased the rug pad expecting it to be 2' x 4' but it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Only stayed "sticky" for about a week. Now the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only stayed "sticky" for about a week. Now the rug slides around just as much as before. In fact, the non-slip rug pad doesn't even stay under the rug. I'm constantly putting the pad back under the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I cut it down to fit a smaller area rug. I was able to cut it easily and it did not "unravel" after cutting. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: mmhendrix

customer_reviews.title: Unusual use of this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cushion for my coffee table and made it into more of a foot rest but the cushion kept sliding off. I purchased this nonslip pad and cut it just a bit smaller than the cushion and put it on my coffee table and now all is in place with no more sliding and I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and is the perfect size for a runner.
customer_reviews.author: igz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not help my rug from slipping -- way to expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Wave12345

product_meta.title: Con-Tact Rug Pad 9x12, Non-Slip Area Rug Pad, Eco-Stay for Hard Floors
product_meta.description: Size:9-Feet by 12-FeetThe Eco stay rug underlay from Vantage is the luxury rug pad solution for a Greener home. Made with natural soybean oil, This rug pad keeps area rugs in place while adding cushioning underfoot. It can be used under any type of rug or mat and can easily be cut to fit any size. Polymer-coated polyester textile can be washed by hand. For indoor use only. 20 Year .
feature_bullets: FLOOR PROTECTION: Area rug pad protects floors from marring, staining and general wear and tear
NON-SLIP RUG PAD: Keeps area rugs in place, adds cushion for comfort, reduces wrinkles and extends rug life
STRONG AND DURABLE: We manufacture our non-slip rug pads to the highest QC standards for customer satisfaction
EASY INSTALL: If the pre-cut size you ordered does not fit, you can trim or cut rug pad to size with household scissors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars113 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
